data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Fernandez, Julio C. C., Cárdenas, César A., Bravo, Alejandro, Lôbo-Hajdu, Gisele, Willenz, Philippe, Hajdu, Eduardo (2016): Lissodendoryx (Ectyodoryx) Lundbeck, 1909 (Coelosphaeridae, Poecilosclerida, Demospongiae) from Southern Chile: new species and a discussion of morphologic characters in the subgenus. Zootaxa 4092 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.1.4
